title: Create Shop page with English and Spanish translations

Include: free local pickup info (Wed-Sat 11am-4pm), 30-day return policy, note about no warranties. Emphasize that purchases support the nonprofit mission.

description: Search local Portland Oregon news sources for coverage of Free Geek. Build database of articles, dates, topics, and key quotes

title: Internationalize programs page hardcoded strings
description: Programs page (src/app/programs/page.tsx) has hardcoded English strings that bypass next-intl. Need to audit and add translation keys.

title: Add Ambassador Program page (EN/ES)
description: Create dedicated page for the Ambassador Program volunteer opportunity with program details, benefits, and sign-up process. Currently referenced but not fully surfaced.

title: Internationalize hardcoded addresses across all pages
description: Address strings (1731 SE 10th Avenue, Portland, OR 97214) are hardcoded in page.tsx, donate-tech/page.tsx, shop/page.tsx, contact/page.tsx. Should use translation keys for consistent localization.

title: Refactor home page to use shared Section component
description: Home page uses raw section elements with custom styling instead of the shared Section component used by other pages. This creates inconsistent spacing and typography. Should be refactored for structural consistency.

description: Create a page for THE BRIDGE monthly giving program. Should explain the digital divide problem, membership benefits (welcome gift, quarterly reports, raffle entries, annual gift), and include donation CTA.

description: Create digital skills detail page - linked from footer

title: Unify copy tone and voice across all pages

title: Internationalize image alt text across all pages
